name: Polybion Syrup
description: Polybion SF Syrup is a vitamin B complex supplement containing a combination of Vitamin B1 (also known as thiamine), Vitamin B2 (riboflavin), Vitamin B3 (nicotinamide), Vitamin B6 (pyridoxine), Vitamin B12 (Cyanocobalamin) and D-panthenol (which is a provitamin of B5).Thiamine (Vitamin B1): It helps the body to break down sugars in the diet, thus helps in improving the functions of the heart and nerve cells.*Images for illustration purpose only, Product received may vary.
